name: FattoreMamma Tools
author: colorinside studio

sections.description:
This plugin is reserved to FattoreMamma Active’s users. This tool monitors blogposts performances, only if included in authorized FattoreMamma’s campaign identified by a campaign code.

Main Features

  • Monitoring FattoreMamma adv blogpost performances
  • The plugin is reserved to FattoreMamma Active users, registered with email an blog url.
  • The monitoring works with a ID code which is provided in Active after a blogger is involved in a specific campaign.
  • Only Active – provided codes can be used, and they will be verified after each post save/update.
  • This platform monitors post URLs where the code setting is active (not any other URL).

Support

We provide support for our plugin on https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/fm-tools
sections.installation:
1. Put the plug-in folder into [wordpress_dir]/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go into the WordPress admin interface and activate the plugin
  3. Go to FattoreMamma Tools’ options page and verify your account
